  • Add OpenMP support to TH_TENSOR_DIM_APPLY3

body_text:
More generally, the issue is:

Add OpenMP support to TH_TENSOR_DIM_APPLY3
topk pointer: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L2547-L2566
body:
More generally, the issue is:
- Add OpenMP support to [TH_TENSOR_DIM_APPLY3](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/96febbb7622db6864542bd0e8735774b715c6a12/torch/lib/TH/THTensorDimApply.h#L4)
- topk pointer: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L2547-L2566
